title: New York Rangers ( NHL ) average ticket price 2014/15
yAxis: Average ticket price in U.S. dollars
summary: The chart at hand is a line chart where the x axis denotes Year and a y axis denotes Average ticket price in U.S. dollars. In total the number of data points it has is 10.
In general Average ticket price in U.S. dollars has rose over the Year.
Average ticket price in U.S. dollars is slightly increasing from 05/06 to 07/08, roughly constant from 07/08 to 10/11, and finally slightly increasing from 10/11 to 14/15.
The steepest increase occurs in between the Year 10/11 and 11/12.
The highest Average ticket price in U.S. dollars, of value 77.87 was reached at Year 14/15
Minimum Average ticket price in U.S. dollars about 45.83 was reached at Year 05/06
